title: Arrest made in fatal migrant smuggling incident on train
description: One man has been arrested in connection with the smuggling incident that led to 17 migrants being found trapped on a train on in Uvalde County, Texas.

title: John Fetterman set for return to Senate following treatment for depression
description: John Fetterman is expected to return to the Senate the week of April 17, more than a month after checking into an inpatient facility with depression

title: Ohio lawmakers OK rail safety rules after train derailment
description: Rail safety measures proposed after the East Palestine train derailment are closer to becoming law in Ohio

title: Officers faced uncertainty of where victims, suspect were in school shooting
description: When the suspected shooter drove into the parking lot of Nashville's Covenant School at 9:53 a.m. local time on Monday, a group of children were at a playground.

title: Neighbor files lawsuit against chocolate factory over deadly explosion
description: A woman who lives near a chocolate factory that exploded has filed a lawsuit against R.M. Palmer accusing it of negligence. Seven people died in the explosion.

title: Railroad will use Ohio-based firms for derailment cleanup
description: Norfolk Southern has agreed to exclusively use Ohio-based businesses to clean up the site of a fiery train derailment last month in a small town near the Pennsylvania state line

title: Starbucks' ex-CEO denies lawbreaking, Sen. Sanders accuses company of 'union busting'
description: Howard Schultz faced sharp criticism over Starbucks' response to a union wave.

title: Colorado man cites fear of homelessness in ax killings case
description: An 81-year-old Colorado man accused of killing his wife and daughter with an ax told police he lost his job and was afraid that they would end up homeless

title: Investigators examine pipeline in chocolate factory blast
description: Federal safety investigators are looking at a natural gas pipeline for fractures and other damage as they gather evidence on the cause of a deadly explosion at a Pennsylvania chocolate factory

title: Murdaugh judge Newman not surprised by jury's quick verdict
description: The judge who presided over Alex Murdaugh’s murder trial in South Carolina told his law school he wasn’t surprised the jury came back with a guilty verdict in three hours

title: Pope Francis taken to hospital with respiratory infection
description: Pope Francis was diagnosed with a respiratory infection Wednesday and was rushed to the hospital, where he will remain for several days.

title: Arizona governor's aide resigns after controversial tweet
description: The press secretary of Arizona Gov. Katie Hobbs has resigned after a controversial social media post made in the wake of a fatal shooting at a Tennessee school

title: Hitman in New Jersey murder-for-hire sentenced to 16 years
description: A career criminal whose rap sheet includes bank robberies and a murder conspiracy was sentenced to 16 years for killing a New Jersey political consultant in exchange for money in 2014

title: Transgender bill spurs competing rallies at Kentucky Capitol
description: Activists on both sides of the transgender health care debate have gathered at Kentucky's Capitol to make competing appeals

title: Congress to consider new no-fly list for unruly passengers
description: Congress is taking another look at creating a new no-fly list for unruly passengers

title: WATCH:  Watch the heartwarming moment this injured deputy walked his daughter down the aisle
description: Master Deputy Harold ‘Hal’ Davis of Florida was left temporarily paralyzed after an accident last year, but was able to be there for his daughter on her big day following intense physical therapy.

title: Capitol Riot: FBI informant testifies for Proud Boys defense
description: An FBI informant who marched to the U.S. Capitol with fellow Proud Boys members has testified that he didn’t know of any plans for the far-right extremist group to invade the building on Jan. 6

title: UK to house thousands of asylum seekers in ex-military bases
description: Britain’s government says it is planning to house thousands of asylum seekers in two disused military bases

title: WATCH:  Alabama bridge collapses after heavy rain and flooding
description: A man in Alabama stopped driving and started recording when he noticed the ground was gone beneath a bridge—just in time for it to crumble into the creek below.

title: 13 states on alert for strong winds, heavy snow as major storm heads east
description: Storm hits the west leaving 13 states from Oregon to Texas on alert for strong winds and heavy snow.

title: Reparations for Black Californians could top $800 billion
description: The preliminary estimate is more than 2.5 times California's annual budget.

title: New Hampshire high court rejects Pamela Smart's latest chance at freedom
description: The New Hampshire Supreme Court court on Wednesday dismissed a petition that could have set Pamela Smart on a path to freedom.

title: Vatican: Pope Francis goes to hospital for scheduled tests
description: The Vatican says Pope Francis has gone to a Rome hospital for some scheduled tests

title: FDA approves over-the-counter Narcan to reduce drug overdoses
description: The FDA approved the overdose reversal drug Narcan for over-the-counter use Monday.

title: Irvo Otieno funeral to be held amid outrage over his death
description: Irvo Otieno’s funeral will be held Wednesday following outrage over his in-custody death.

title: UN atomic watchdog chief returns to Ukraine nuclear plant
description: The head of the U.N.’s atomic energy watchdog has returned to the Zaporizhzhia Nuclear Power Plant in Ukraine

title: United Airlines flight makes emergency landing in Houston
description: A United Airlines flight bound from Houston to Rio De Janeiro returned to Bush Intercontinental Airport for an emergency landing shortly after takeoff

title: Russia launches drills of its nuclear missile forces
description: A senior Russian diplomat says Moscow has suspended sharing information about its nuclear forces with the United States, including notices about missile tests

title: Germany's high court orders amendment of child marriage ban
description: Germany’s constitutional court ruled Wednesday that a law banning child marriages needs to be amended because it removes the possibility of continuing a marriage once both spouses become adults

title: Mother of deceased cadet speaks out after police reopen case
description: Alexander Bello-Ortiz’s mother spoke out Monday about the death of her son after the Daytona Beach Police Department reopened the case last year.

title: Israeli PM, Biden exchange frosty words over legal overhaul
description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu says Israel makes its own decisions, rebuffing President Joe Biden’s suggestion that that the premier drop a contentious plan to overhaul the legal system

title: Nashville school shooting updates: Tennessee governor calls for prayers
description: Tennessee Gov. Bill Lee has called for prayers in the wake of a Nashville school shooting while noting that "there will be a time to talk about the legislation."

title: UBS brings back Ermotti as CEO with Credit Suisse deal ahead
description: UBS says it’s bringing back former CEO Sergio Ermotti to lead the Swiss bank as it moves forward with a government-orchestrated plan to take over struggling rival Credit Suisse

title: Biden starts summit with $690M pledge for democracy programs
description: President Joe Biden is kicking off his second Summit for Democracy with a pledge for the U.S. to spend $690 million bolstering democracy programs around the globe

title: Dolphin harassment cases opened against 33 swimmers in Hawaii
description: Thirty-three swimmers are being accused of "pursuing, corralling, and harassing" a pod of dolphins in Hōnaunau Bay on Sunday

title: How to watch the 5-planet alignment: Jupiter, Mercury, Venus, Uranus and Mars
description: A five-planet alignment will be visible in the night sky on Tuesday, March 28.

title: WATCH:  Unlikely duo: Dog, goat become best friends at animal shelter
description: A North Carolina animal shelter is trying to find a forever home for a couple of unlikely best friends: a dog named Felix and a goat named Cinnamon.

title: 2 officers shot while responding to call, hospitalized with life-threatening injuries
description: Two police officers in Huntsville, Alabama, were shot while responding to a shooting call and have been hospitalized with life-threatening injuries, police said.

title: Philadelphia water 'safe to drink and use' after nearby chemical spill, city says
description: Residents in Philadelphia can safely drink the water following a nearby chemical spill, the city's water department said Tuesday evening.
